home.registration: Registration for Summer 2021 classes begins June 31, 2021!
home.parentBrowse: Browse through programs below and then select a class with the date and time of your choice! We make sure that 100% of our participants’ demonstrated needs are met.
home.volunteerBrowse: Volunteering with SDC is simple and easy! Get started with volunteering with SDC by creating an account to volunteer and then selecting the program you want to volunteer for.

signIn.firstTime: First time? We’ll email you a magic code to sign up instantly.
